author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-On Assignment Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.28
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - On Assignment Inc:
* ON ASSIGNMENT REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.28 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9.4 PERCENT TO $679.1 MILLION * ‍ON ASSIGNMENT IS PROVIDING FINANCIAL ESTIMATES FOR Q1 OF 2018​
* ‍SEES Q1 REVENUES OF $672.0 MILLION TO $682.0 MILLION​ * SEES Q1 ‍EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.46 TO $0.50; SEES Q1 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.74 TO $0.78​
* ‍PROVIDING PRELIMINARY FINANCIAL ESTIMATES FOR ECS, ON A STAND ALONE BASIS, FOR FULL YEAR 2018​
* SEES PRELIMINARY ECS FY 2018 ‍REVENUES OF $620.0 MILLION TO $640.0 MILLION​
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.74, REVENUE VIEW $668.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
